alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 12:52PM AKST until January 12 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow, freezing rain and blowing snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds and ice accumulation could cause damage to power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected near Unalakleet. The heaviest snow and blowing snow is expected near Elim. Snow will continue off and on through tonight. Freezing rain is possible into tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
